translation.aboutCovidDescription: Á heimasíðunni covid.is er að finna ýmis góð ráð og traustar upplýsingar.
translation.enableLocationDescriptionAndroid: The app will request permission to record your movements/location data.
translation.enableLocationDescriptionIOS: The app will request permission to record your movements/location data. During this process, it is very important to select the option <1>“Allow while using app”</1>.
translation.enableLocationMessageIOS: Shortly after you have set up the app in your device, it will ask you for permission to save location data while the app is not in use. At this point, it is important to select the option <1>“Change to Always Allow”</1>. This is required if the app is to perform its intended function.
translation.enableNotificationDescription: The app will also request permission to send you notifications.
translation.genericErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again in a moment.
translation.incorrentPINMessage: Incorrect PIN number, please try again.
translation.phoneNumberDescription: Þú færð síðan sendan kóða sem þú slærð inn í næsta skrefi.
translation.pinNumberDescription: Sláðu inn kóðann sem þú fékkst sendan með SMS skilaboðum
translation.pinPhone: We'll send a pin code to {{phoneNumber}}.
translation.requestDataKennitalaInfo: Vinsamlegast sláðu inn kennitöluna þína áður en þú sendir staðsetningarnar.
translation.requestDataSubTitle: Smitrakningarteymi Almannavarna óskar eftir því að þú sendir þínar staðsetningar til að hjálpa til við smitrakningu.
translation.requestDataThanks: Takk fyrir að senda Almannarvörnum gögn!
translation.trackingSubtitle: Vel gert! Þú ert að leggja þitt að mörkum við smit-rakningu COVID-19.
translation.trackingNotification: Vel gert! Nú ertu hluti af rakningarteyminu.
translation.welcomeHowDescription: The app saves data on your movements/locations and stores them securely in your device. In certain instances, the Contact Tracing Team may send you a notification and request that you forward them the data. Then you can send the data to the Team with a single click. This will make it easier to trace the spread of COVID-19 while the epidemic is ongoing.
translation.welcomeHowTitle: How does the app work, and what information does it store?
translation.welcomeInfoDescription: Only your telephone number is stored in the centralised database; no other information is sent there.
translation.welcomeInfoTitle: Your device stores your location data for the past 14 days. Older data are deleted automatically.
translation.welcomeSubtitle: Let’s help the Department of Civil Protection and Emergency Management’s Contact Tracing Team to trace potential COVID-19 contagion paths in Iceland.
